# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)
    out = String[]
    for w in split(s)
        if length(out) == 0 || length(w) + length(out[end]) <= text_width
            push!(out, w)
        else
            push!(out, "\n" * w)
        end
    end
    return join(out)
end
```
Examples:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc ultricies eros in semper porta.")
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,\nconsectetur adipiscing elit.\nNunc ultricies eros in semper porta."
```
